Vulnerability.Title: Cisco Video Surveillance IP Cameras RTSP Crafted Packet Vulnerability

Notes.Note: The Cisco Video Surveillance IP Cameras 2421, 2500 series, and 2600 series of devices are affected by a RSTP TCP crafted packets denial of service vulnerability that may allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause the device to reload by sending a series of crafted packets. This vulnerability can be exploited from both wired and wireless segments.
